Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Boola mbu; “enywe Abandu! Ni muli nende obukanakani khudini yanje, esie shelamanga ebiamulaamanga habundu wa Nyasaye tawe, halali elaamanga Nyasaye ulia ulibafwisia ne yanomesiyie mbu embe mubasuubili.”
Ne ohenjie obweni bubwo khu idini yokhutswenulila emilukha chichio khu Nyasaye, ne olaba mubatsokaasinjia Nyasaye tawe
Ne olalaama ebilali Nyasaye, bilakhakhukhoonya nohomba okhumisia tawe, ne nokhola orio olaba mubandu ababii

Ne Nyasaye nakhutilakhwo khububii, abulaho yesiyesi unyala okhurusiliaho libii elo owulali ye tawe, ne nakhwenyela amalayi abulaho unyala okhukalusia obulayi bwaye, ahelesinjia owayenya mubandu bebe, naye ni Omunji wobulesheli Omunji wetsimbabaasi

Boola mbu; “Enywe Abandu toto obwatoto bumalile okhuboolela okhurula khu Nyasaye wenyu. Kho ulia ulunjikha alunjikhanga khululwe omwene, naye ulia ukora akoranga khululwe omwene. Nasi shendi omulindi khwinywe tawe
Ne loonda akofimbulilungwa, ne wisumulisie okhula shingala Nyasaye alabusia, Naye niye Omubusia Omulayi muno umalayo
